channel.title: hubble on A fractal spectrum of tales
channel.description: Recent content in hubble on A fractal spectrum of tales

item.title: Modern Art in Space
item.description: Well… the title is a spoiler, but is this a painting? Are those falling meteors? What is that? The first time I’ve seen it, out of context, I tought it was a crop of some decaying taken from LHC. In fact, this is a picture coming from the Hubble Space Telescope. But a quite unusual one. Scientists suspects it’s the result of the choice of a bad reference point in space for tracking/stabilization.
